mission.title: Innovation and Digital Solutions for Your Company's Success
mission.paragraph1: At Molokaih we transform ideas into personalized digital solutions that drive productivity, innovation and sustainable growth for businesses.
mission.paragraph2: We develop professional websites, performance marketing strategies and intelligent AI automations to optimize processes and results.
mission.paragraph3: Our team combines technology, design and marketing to offer measurable and effective strategies.
mission.paragraph4: We believe in transparency, constant innovation and long-term relationships based on trust and real results.

values.title: Values
values.paragraph1: At Molokaih, our values guide every project.
values.paragraph2: We unite aesthetics, functionality and innovation to create digital experiences that generate real results.
values.paragraph3: We work with transparency, constant communication and genuine commitment to each client.
values.paragraph4: Everything we do seeks to create lasting value for your business.

vision.title: Vision
vision.text:
To be the leading digital agency in technological innovation and smart marketing, recognized for transforming businesses and turning complex challenges into simple, effective and scalable solutions.

We aspire to be the preferred strategic partner for companies looking to stand out and generate real impact in the digital world.

mission.title: Mission
mission.text:
To drive business growth through comprehensive digital solutions that combine web development, data-driven marketing and intelligent automation.

We focus on measurable results, lasting relationships and a culture based on excellence, transparency and shared success.

info.title: Contact Us
info.subtitle: Have questions about our products/services, orders or just want to say hello? We're here to help you.

impulso-negocio.question: How can a website boost my business?
impulso-negocio.answer: Having a website helps more people discover your business, makes it easier for them to contact you and builds trust and credibility. With a well-structured design and effective promotion, you'll attract more customers and successfully grow your business.

que-es-seo.question: What is SEO and why does my business need it?
que-es-seo.answer: SEO (Search Engine Optimization) helps your website rank better in search engine results, increasing your online visibility and attracting more potential customers. It positions your business ahead of competitors, making it easier for customers to find and choose you.

landing-page.question: How can a landing page help me sell more?
landing-page.answer: A landing page is specifically designed to convert visitors into leads or customers. It clearly highlights a specific product or offer, guiding users directly toward an action (buy, register or request information), which directly increases your sales.

publicidad-pagada.question: How does paid advertising work and how much should I invest?
publicidad-pagada.answer: Paid advertising (Google Ads, Facebook Ads, etc.) allows you to target your ads to a specific audience. The budget depends on your goals, market and industry; you can start with a small investment and adjust it based on results and allocated budget. This is always backed by well-designed and personalized strategies to optimize campaign performance, ensuring your investment generates the greatest possible impact on your audience and business growth.

web-vs-mobile.question: What's the difference between a web application and a mobile application?
web-vs-mobile.answer: A web application runs directly in your browser, offering instant accessibility without installation. A mobile application, however, is specifically designed to be downloaded, providing better performance, unique features and offline access. Both are optimized for all devices.

software-personalizado.question: What are the benefits of custom software and how do I know if my business needs it?
software-personalizado.answer: If the software you currently use doesn't align with your business processes, requires manual integration of multiple tools, or if you want to automate tasks, a custom software solution may be the best option.
points: Total adaptability and accessibility to meet your business needs
Scalability to grow with your business
Integration with the tools you already use

servicios-molokaih.question: What services does Molokaih offer?
servicios-molokaih.answer: We offer web development and design, automation, artificial intelligence, custom software, digital marketing, maintenance and support.

paises.question: In which countries do you have a presence or serve clients?
paises.answer: We have a digital presence in North America and Latin America, and serve clients in countries such as the United States, Canada, Mexico, Argentina, Colombia and more.

tipo-empresas.question: What type of companies does Molokaih serve?
tipo-empresas.answer: We work with companies of all sizes, primarily in the B2B sector. We support entrepreneurs and businesses from various industries such as construction, retail, professional services and more.

idiomas.question: In what languages can you serve me?
idiomas.answer: We serve in English, Spanish and Portuguese.

servicios-individuales.question: Can I hire just one service or must it be complete packages?
servicios-individuales.answer: You can hire individual services or comprehensive packages, depending on your company's needs.

proceso-trabajo.question: What is the work process with Molokaih?
proceso-trabajo.answer: We start with a consultation to understand your goals, define the scope, manage the project in clear stages and keep you informed throughout the process.

mantenimiento.question: Do you offer support and maintenance after delivery?
mantenimiento.answer: Yes, we have maintenance and proactive support plans to ensure optimal operation of your digital platforms.

contacto-soporte.question: How can I contact the support team?
contacto-soporte.answer: You can reach us via email, phone, social media or chat on our website.

faq1.question: What social media tasks can be automated?
faq1.answer: With our solutions you can schedule publications, manage direct messages, respond to comments, update stories and even launch advertising campaigns on Instagram, WhatsApp and Facebook. This allows you to maintain a constant presence without depending on daily manual management.

faq2.question: On which platforms do chatbots work?
faq2.answer: The chatbots we develop integrate natively with WhatsApp, Facebook Messenger and Instagram Direct. This way, your customers receive fast and consistent responses on any of the channels where they interact with you.

faq3.question: Do I need technical knowledge to use them?
faq3.answer: You don't need previous experience or programming knowledge. We take care of designing and configuring the automations so they are intuitive and easy to use. This way you can focus on your business while technology works for you.

faq4.question: Can they integrate with my current tools?
faq4.answer: Yes, our automations connect with CRM systems, email marketing platforms and analytics tools. This ensures a unified digital ecosystem, where all your data flows in the same environment and facilitates strategic decision making.

faq5.question: How do automations improve customer engagement?
faq5.answer: Bots respond in seconds and offer personalized attention, which increases your customers' satisfaction. Additionally, automated campaigns deliver relevant and timely messages, generating more interaction and strengthening the relationship with your community.

faq6.question: What level of security do data and conversations have?
faq6.answer: Security is a priority. We implement advanced encryption and data protection protocols to safeguard both your information and your customers'. We comply with best practices in cybersecurity so you can operate with complete confidence.

faq7.question: Can I make changes or adjustments to the automations?
faq7.answer: Of course. We offer continuous support and total flexibility to modify responses, flows or integrations. As your digital strategy evolves, we adapt the automations so they are always aligned with your business objectives.

tiempo-desarrollo.question: How long does it take to develop a professional website?
tiempo-desarrollo.answer: Time varies depending on project complexity. A simple landing page can be ready in 2-3 weeks, a corporate site with 5-10 pages takes 4-6 weeks, and a complete online store may require 8-12 weeks. We include design, development, review and optimization phases. We provide a detailed timeline from the start so you know exactly what to expect at each stage.

costo-mantenimiento.question: Do I need to pay monthly maintenance for my website?
costo-mantenimiento.answer: It depends on your needs. Hosting and domain have standard annual costs ($100-300 USD/year). Technical maintenance (security updates, plugins, backups) is optional but recommended ($50-150 USD/month). If your site requires frequent content updates, design changes or priority support, we offer maintenance plans that include these services plus monthly development hours.

cms-editar.question: Will I be able to edit my site's content myself after delivery?
cms-editar.answer: Absolutely. All our sites include an intuitive administration panel (CMS) where you can edit texts, add images, create new pages and update content without programming. Additionally, we train you in a 1-2 hour session so you master all functions. For more complex design or structure changes, you can always count on our technical support.

responsive-mobile.question: Will the website look good on phones and tablets?
responsive-mobile.answer: Yes, we design with a mobile-first approach. This means your site adapts perfectly to any device (phone, tablet, laptop, desktop) without losing functionality or aesthetics. Over 70% of users browse from mobile, which is why we especially optimize the mobile experience: loading speed, touch navigation, accessible buttons and well-distributed content. We test on multiple devices before delivery.

seo-posicionamiento.question: Will my website appear on Google automatically?
seo-posicionamiento.answer: Yes, but ranking well requires continuous work. We deliver your site with optimized technical SEO: clean code, fast speed, sitemap, meta tags, and correct structure. This provides the foundation for Google to index you. However, appearing in top results requires content strategy, keyword research, link building and continuous optimization. We offer monthly SEO services if you're looking for competitive positioning in your industry.

presupuesto-meta.question: What is the recommended minimum budget for a Meta (Facebook/Instagram) advertising campaign?
presupuesto-meta.answer: We recommend a minimum budget of $500-$1,000 USD monthly for effective Meta Ads campaigns. This amount allows Meta's algorithm to collect enough data to optimize your ads, perform A/B tests and reach your target audience consistently. With lower budgets, the campaign may take longer to generate measurable results and limits segmentation and optimization options.

resultados-tiempo.question: How long does it take to see results with a digital marketing strategy?
resultados-tiempo.answer: First performance indicators usually appear in 2-4 weeks, but solid and consistent results are generally observed between 3-6 months. Digital marketing is a continuous optimization process: the first 30 days are dedicated to data collection, the next 60 days to adjustment and optimization, and from the third month is when results consolidate. Patience and constant analysis are key to long-term success.

google-vs-meta.question: Is it better to invest in Google Ads or Meta Ads for my business?
google-vs-meta.answer: It depends on your goals and type of business. Google Ads is ideal for capturing existing demand (people already searching for your product/service), while Meta Ads works better for generating demand and creating awareness. The most effective is usually a combined strategy: use Google Ads for high-intent direct conversions and Meta Ads to build audience, remarketing and engagement. We analyze your specific case to determine the best budget distribution between both platforms.

roi-medicion.question: How is return on investment (ROI) measured in digital marketing?
roi-medicion.answer: We measure ROI through multiple metrics: cost per acquisition (CPA), customer lifetime value (LTV), conversion rate, and return on ad spend (ROAS). We implement tracking pixels, configure Analytics conversions, and generate detailed monthly reports that show exactly how many leads, sales or valuable actions each dollar invested generated. Full transparency in metrics is essential to demonstrate the real impact of each campaign.

projectsMarketing.title: Transform Your Business with
projectsMarketing.description: Real solutions that drive growth, optimize processes, and multiply your results. See how we turn challenges into competitive advantages.

erp.title: Complete Management Systems
erp.description: Centralize everything in one place: sales, inventory, finance, and clients. Save time and make smarter decisions.

automation.title: Process Automation
automation.description: Eliminate repetitive tasks and focus on what matters. Increase productivity by up to 300% with intelligent automation.

dashboard.title: Executive Dashboard
dashboard.description: Visualize your business performance in real time. Key metrics, KPIs and automated reports for agile and effective decision making.

analytics.title: Advanced Analytics
analytics.description: Interactive dashboards with complex charts, predictive analytics and machine learning. Convert data into strategic insights to drive growth.

services.title: Our
services.description: At Molokaih we offer software solutions designed to generate real impact on your company. We focus on innovation, scalability and efficiency to accompany your growth.

desarrolloMedida.title: Custom Software Development
desarrolloMedida.description: We create personalized solutions that perfectly adapt to your business processes, optimizing every workflow and maximizing operational efficiency.

aplicaciones.title: Web and Mobile Applications
aplicaciones.description: We develop multi-platform applications with latest generation technologies, guaranteeing exceptional performance and intuitive user experiences.

integraciones.title: Integrations and Automations
integraciones.description: We connect your existing systems and automate repetitive processes, allowing your team to focus on high-value strategic tasks.

consultoria.title: Technology Consulting
consultoria.description: We advise on the choice of appropriate technologies, software architecture and digital transformation strategies to drive sustainable growth.

benefits.title: Key Benefits of Working with
benefits.description: Choosing Molokaih means partnering with a team that understands both technology and business strategy. Our goal is to build tools that work today and remain competitive.

medida.title: Tailored to Your Business
medida.description: We design each solution from scratch, adapting to your unique processes. No generic templates, only software that reflects your vision and specific needs.

seguro.title: Secure and Reliable
seguro.description: We implement best security practices in every line of code. Your information and your customers' protected with the highest industry standards.

integracion.title: Ready for Integration
integracion.description: Our solutions connect seamlessly with your existing systems. Robust APIs and complete documentation for smooth and fast integration.

tiempo.question: How long does it take to develop custom software?
tiempo.answer: The time depends on the project's complexity. A simple application can be ready in 4-6 weeks, while complete enterprise systems can take 3-6 months. During the initial consultation, we define a realistic timeline based on your specific needs.

integracion.question: Can you integrate the software with my existing tools?
integracion.answer: Yes. We specialize in building integrations with CRMs, ERPs, APIs and other business tools to optimize workflows and ensure all your systems work in harmony.

cloud.question: Do you also offer cloud-based solutions?
cloud.answer: Absolutely. We develop and implement cloud-native solutions on platforms like AWS, Google Cloud and Azure. This ensures scalability, security and access from anywhere, reducing infrastructure costs.

empresas.question: What type of companies benefit from custom software?
empresas.answer: Any company with unique processes or specific needs that generic tools cannot cover. From startups that need an MVP to established companies seeking advanced automation or competitive advantages through technology.

soporte.question: Do you offer post-launch support?
soporte.answer: Yes. We offer ongoing support and maintenance plans that include updates, bug fixes, performance optimizations and new features. Your software will always be up to date and running at maximum capacity.

webDev.title: Web Development
webDev.description: Transform your vision into powerful digital platforms. We build lightning-fast, SEO-optimized websites and scalable web applications that drive conversions, enhance user experience, and position your brand as an industry leader.

design.title: Custom Software
design.description: Break free from generic solutions. We engineer bespoke software tailored to your unique workflows, automate complex processes, and give you the competitive edge that off-the-shelf products simply cannot deliver.

marketing.title: Digital Marketing
marketing.description: Stop wasting ad spend. Our data-driven strategies and expertly managed Google Ads campaigns deliver qualified leads, maximize ROI, and turn your marketing budget into measurable revenue growth month after month.

automation.title: Process Automation
automation.description: Reclaim hours every day. We automate repetitive tasks, streamline operations with AI-powered chatbots, and optimize your workflows so your team focuses on what truly matters—growing your business.

item1.title: Professional Brand Identity
item1.description: We build cohesive and timeless visual identities that reflect your brand’s personality, strengthen recognition, and create a lasting connection with your audience.

item2.title: Social Media Management and Strategy
item2.description: Digital marketing strategies focused on measurable results. We increase your ROI with optimized campaigns on Google Ads, social media and SEO.

item3.title: Strategic Digital Advertising
item3.description: We design and execute online advertising campaigns on Google Ads, social media and other channels, to maximize your reach, generate leads and convert customers.

item4.title: Digital Process Automation
item4.description: We optimize and automate your business processes to save time, reduce costs and eliminate errors. Technology that works for you 24/7.

item5.title: Custom Software Development
item5.description: We create custom software that perfectly adapts to your business's unique needs, scalable and with the latest market technologies.

step1.title: Understanding Your Needs
step1.description: We meet with you to thoroughly understand your business, goals and challenges. This phase is crucial to align our strategy with your expectations and objectives.

step2.title: Strategic Planning
step2.description: We develop a detailed plan that includes timelines, resources and technologies to be used, ensuring efficient and effective execution.

step3.title: Design and Prototyping
step3.description: We create wireframes and interactive prototypes to visualize the structure, flow and user experience, ensuring that every element is aligned with your goals and expectations.

step4.title: Development and Implementation
step4.description: Our developers and designers work together to build the solution, conducting continuous testing to ensure quality and functionality at every stage of the process.

step5.title: Testing and Optimization
step5.description: We conduct exhaustive testing to identify and correct any issues, optimizing performance and user experience before launch.

step6.title: Review and Refinement
step6.description: We gather your feedback and make necessary adjustments to ensure the final product meets your expectations and objectives.

step7.title: Launch and Ongoing Support
step7.description: We launch your project and monitor results, providing ongoing support and improvements based on real data.

testimonials.title: More than 150 companies have trusted us to grow their business.

1.name: Оксана Роздорожная
1.testimonial: Very happy with my experience with Molokaih! A professional team that responds quickly, communicates clearly, and delivers real results. Highly recommend.

2.name: Camila Torres
2.testimonial: Their work exceeded our expectations. The team is creative, fast and very professional.

3.name: Danel Manzanares
3.testimonial: Molokaih has been a true partner for Smart Cap, collaborating in the realization of a truly differentiated digital platform that has completely revolutionized our student experience.

4.name: Hilla Almog
4.testimonial: If you're looking for a digital marketing company that actually delivers — and feels like a true extension of your team — I highly recommend Molokaih.

5.name: Martín Herrera
5.testimonial: They helped us completely renovate our website. Not only does it look better, it also loads faster and converts much more. The impact on our sales was immediate.

6.name: Nico Veinneau
6.testimonial: Molokaih is a great over all company. It knows what's it's doing, and can assist you in everything you neeed. You won't be disappointed with the services. If you are hesitant with other company's, no need to here.

7.name: Julián Ríos
7.testimonial: I had a serious problem with lead management. Molokaih implemented an automated solution that allowed me to respond instantly and improve conversion.

8.name: Valeria Castro
8.testimonial: Our social media presence was non-existent. With Molokaih's help, we went from zero to having an active and engaged community in less than three months.

9.name: Christosch
9.testimonial: The attention I received was so good, very professional and proactive service.

10.name: Agustina León
10.testimonial: The redesign they did of our website not only improved the visual aspect, it also positioned better on Google. We climbed to the top 3 in weeks.

11.name: Alena Balashova
11.testimonial: We worked with Molokaih CA to redesign our company website, and the experience exceeded all expectations. From the first consultation to the final launch, the team was professional, innovative, and highly responsive. Highly recommend Molokaih CA to anyone looking for reliable and skilled web technology experts.

12.name: Mariana Vázquez
12.testimonial: What I value most about working with Molokaih is that they don't sell generic solutions. They listened to my needs and delivered exactly what we needed.

PrivacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPolicy.paragraphOne: At Molokaih LLC, we are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring transparency in how we handle your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains what data we collect, how we use it, and the rights you have regarding your information. Our commitment to privacy is guided by international regulations, including the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), the California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA), the Lei Geral de Proteção de Dados (LGPD - Brazil), and other global privacy standards.
PrivacyPolicy.paragraphTwo: By using our services, you acknowledge that you have read and understood this Privacy Policy and agree to the practices described herein. If you do not agree with this policy, please do not use our services.

sectionOne.title: 1. Information We Collect
sectionOne.text: We collect personal data in two main ways:
sectionOne.pointOne: Information You Provide: When you complete forms, subscribe to updates, or engage with us for business inquiries, we may collect details such as your name, email, phone number, and company information.
sectionOne.pointTwo: Automatically Collected Data: When you visit our website, we collect information such as your IP address, browser type, device details, and browsing behavior using cookies and similar technologies.
sectionOne.pointThree: Usage Analytics: We analyze how you interact with our services to improve user experience, identify trends, and enhance our offerings.
sectionOne.pointFour: Communication Records: We may retain records of correspondence, support requests, and feedback you provide to us.
sectionOne.pointFive: Payment Information: When you make transactions, we collect necessary payment details through secure third-party payment processors.
sectionOne.note: We do not knowingly collect personal information from individuals under the age of 18. If you are a parent or guardian and believe your child has provided us with personal information, please contact us immediately.

sectionTwo.title: 2. Purpose and Legal Basis for Processing Your Data
sectionTwo.text: We use your information for the following purposes:
sectionTwo.pointOne: Service Delivery: To provide, maintain, and improve our digital services efficiently.
sectionTwo.pointTwo: Communication: To send updates, respond to inquiries, and offer relevant marketing promotions (when applicable).
sectionTwo.pointThree: Analytics and Security: To analyze engagement, maintain platform security, and comply with regulatory requirements.
sectionTwo.pointFour: Third-Party Sharing: We do not sell personal data. We only share it with trusted partners essential for service delivery (payment processors, analytics providers).
sectionTwo.pointFive: Legal Basis: We process data based on legitimate interest, contractual obligations, legal compliance, and explicit consent for marketing activities.
sectionTwo.note: You have the right to withdraw your consent for marketing communications at any time by clicking the unsubscribe link in our emails or contacting us directly at privacy@molokaih.com.

sectionThree.title: 3. Data Retention and Security Measures
sectionThree.text: We prioritize the security and proper management of your data:
sectionThree.pointOne: Data Retention: We only retain your data for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes described in this policy. After the retention period, we ensure secure deletion or anonymization.
sectionThree.pointTwo: Security Measures: We implement strong encryption, access controls, and regular security audits to protect your data from unauthorized access or breaches.
sectionThree.pointThree: International Transfers: When data is transferred across jurisdictions, we ensure compliance with global privacy standards using Standard Contractual Clauses and Data Processing Agreements.
sectionThree.pointFour: Your Rights: You have the right to access, modify, or delete your personal data, restrict processing, or opt out of marketing communications at any time.
sectionThree.pointFive: Exercise Your Rights: To exercise these rights, contact us at privacy@molokaih.com.
sectionThree.note: While we implement industry-standard security measures, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure. We continuously work to enhance our security practices and respond promptly to any potential security incidents.

sectionFour.title: 4. Third-Party Links and Policy Updates
sectionFour.text: Important information about external links and policy changes:
sectionFour.pointOne: Third-Party Links: Our website may contain links to external sites. We partner only with trusted organizations, but we recommend reviewing their privacy policies before sharing personal data.
sectionFour.pointTwo: Policy Updates: We may update this Privacy Policy periodically to reflect changes in our practices or legal requirements.
sectionFour.pointThree: Notification: Any significant changes will be communicated through our website with a revised effective date.
sectionFour.pointFour: Acceptance: Continued use of our services after updates constitutes acceptance of the revised policy.
sectionFour.note: We encourage you to review this Privacy Policy periodically to stay informed about how we protect your information. The 'Last Updated' date at the bottom of this page indicates when the policy was last revised.

sectionFive.title: 5. Governing Law and Jurisdiction
sectionFive.pointOne: Governing Law: This Privacy Policy is governed by the laws of Delaware, United States of America.
sectionFive.pointTwo: International Compliance: We adhere to applicable international data protection regulations including GDPR (EU), CCPA (California), and LGPD (Brazil).
sectionFive.pointThree: Jurisdiction: Any disputes arising from this policy shall be resolved in the courts of Delaware, USA.
sectionFive.pointFour: Alternative Jurisdiction: Disputes may also be resolved in the appropriate jurisdiction as required by applicable law.
sectionFive.pointFive: Legal Updates: We continuously monitor changes in privacy laws to ensure ongoing compliance.
sectionFive.note: If you are located outside the United States, please be aware that your information will be transferred to, stored, and processed in the United States where our servers are located.

paragraphThree.text: If you have any questions about our privacy practices or wish to exercise your rights, please contact us at privacy@molokaih.com.

TermsOfUse.title: Terms of Use
TermsOfUse.paragraphOne: Welcome to Molokaih LLC ('Molokaih,' 'we,' 'our,' or 'us'). These Terms of Use govern your access to and use of our website ('Website') and services. By accessing or using our Website, you agree to comply with these Terms. If you do not agree, please refrain from using our services.

sectionOne.title: 1. Use of Our Website and Services
sectionOne.text: Molokaih provides digital solutions, including software development, web services, and consulting. You may use our Website and services only for lawful purposes and in accordance with these Terms. You agree not to:
sectionOne.pointOne: Violate any applicable laws or regulations.
sectionOne.pointTwo: Interfere with the proper functioning of our Website.
sectionOne.pointThree: Use the Website for fraudulent or harmful activities.
sectionOne.pointFour: Copy, modify, or distribute content from the Website without authorization.
sectionOne.note: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate access to our services if we detect any violation of these Terms or suspect fraudulent activity.

sectionTwo.title: 2. Intellectual Property Rights
sectionTwo.text: All content, trademarks, logos, and intellectual property displayed on the Website are the exclusive property of Molokaih or its licensors. You may not use, copy, reproduce, or distribute any content without prior written consent from us. This includes, but is not limited to:
sectionTwo.pointOne: Textual, graphic, and audiovisual content of the website.
sectionTwo.pointTwo: Source code, design, and structure of the website.
sectionTwo.pointFive: Any software, tools, or applications developed by Molokaih.
sectionTwo.note: If you wish to use our content for commercial purposes, please contact us at info@molokaih.com to discuss licensing arrangements.

sectionThree.title: 3. Third-Party Links and Services
sectionThree.text: Our Website may contain links to third-party websites or services for informational purposes. It is important to understand the following aspects:
sectionThree.pointOne: Third-Party Independence: Molokaih is not responsible for the content, policies, or practices of third-party sites.
sectionThree.pointTwo: User Risk: Accessing external sites is at your own risk and responsibility.
sectionThree.pointThree: Policy Review: We encourage you to review their terms and privacy policies before engaging with them.
sectionThree.pointFour: No Endorsement: Links to third-party sites do not constitute an endorsement by Molokaih.
sectionThree.pointFive: Limitation of Liability: We are not liable for any damages or losses resulting from your use of third-party services.
sectionThree.note: We strive to partner only with trusted entities, but we cannot guarantee the security or accuracy of external sites.

sectionFour.title: 4. Disclaimers and Limitation of Liability
sectionFour.text: Molokaih provides its Website and services 'as is' and 'as available.' We do not guarantee uninterrupted access, accuracy, or error-free performance. To the fullest extent permitted by law, Molokaih disclaims liability for:
sectionFour.pointOne: Any direct, indirect, or incidental damages arising from the use of our Website.
sectionFour.pointTwo: Any errors, omissions, or inaccuracies in content.
sectionFour.pointThree: Any unauthorized access to our servers or data.
sectionFour.note: Some jurisdictions do not allow limitations on liability. In such cases, our liability shall be limited to the maximum extent permitted by applicable law.

sectionFive.title: 5. Changes to These Terms
sectionFive.text: We reserve the right to update these Terms at any time to reflect changes in our practices or legal requirements. It is important that you understand:
sectionFive.pointOne: Right to Modify: We may modify these Terms without prior individual notice.
sectionFive.pointTwo: Publication of Changes: Any modifications will be posted on this page with a revised 'Effective Date.'
sectionFive.pointThree: Notification: Significant changes will be communicated through our website or by email.
sectionFive.pointFour: Implied Acceptance: Continued use of our Website after updates constitutes acceptance of the revised Terms.
sectionFive.pointFive: Periodic Review: We recommend reviewing these Terms periodically to stay informed of any changes.
sectionFive.note: If you do not agree with the modified Terms, you must stop using our services immediately. Your continued use after publication of changes indicates your acceptance of the new Terms.

sectionSix.title: 6. Governing Law and Jurisdiction
sectionSix.text: These Terms of Use are governed by the laws of Delaware, USA. It is important to understand the following legal aspects:
sectionSix.pointOne: Governing Law: These Terms are governed by the laws of Delaware, United States of America.
sectionSix.pointTwo: International Compliance: We adhere to applicable international regulations based on your location.
sectionSix.pointThree: Jurisdiction: Any disputes shall be resolved in the courts of Delaware, USA.
sectionSix.pointFour: Alternative Jurisdiction: Disputes may also be resolved in the appropriate jurisdiction as required by applicable law.
sectionSix.pointFive: Dispute Resolution: We are committed to resolving disputes fairly and in accordance with applicable law.
sectionSix.note: If you are located outside the United States, please be aware that by using our services, you agree that any legal disputes will be governed by Delaware law and resolved in its courts, unless local law requires otherwise.

paragraphThree.text: If you have any questions regarding these Terms, please contact us at privacy@molokaih.com.

CookiesPolicy.title: Cookies Policy
CookiesPolicy.paragraphOne: At Molokaih LLC ('Molokaih,' 'we,' 'our,' or 'us'), we are committed to transparency and protecting your privacy. This Cookies Policy explains what cookies are, how we use them, and how you can manage your preferences. By using our website, you agree to the use of cookies in accordance with this policy.
CookiesPolicy.paragraphTwo: Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device when you visit a website. They help us improve your experience, remember your preferences, and analyze how you use our services.

sectionOne.title: 1. Why Do We Use Cookies?
sectionOne.pointOne: Ensure the proper functioning of our website.
sectionOne.pointTwo: Improve user experience by remembering preferences.
sectionOne.pointThree: Analyze website traffic and user behavior.
sectionOne.note: The use of cookies allows us to provide more personalized services and continuously improve the user experience on our website.
points: Ensure the proper functioning of our website.
Improve user experience by remembering preferences.
Analyze website traffic and user behavior.

sectionTwo.title: 2. Types of Cookies We Use
sectionTwo.text: We use the following types of cookies:
sectionTwo.pointOne: Strictly Necessary Cookies: Essential for website functionality, allowing you to navigate and use features securely. These cannot be disabled.
sectionTwo.pointTwo: Performance Cookies: Help us understand how visitors interact with our site by collecting anonymous data to improve performance.
sectionTwo.pointThree: Functionality Cookies: Store user preferences (language, region, display settings) to enhance the browsing experience.
sectionTwo.pointFour: Advertising Cookies: Used to deliver relevant advertisements based on your browsing habits and preferences.
sectionTwo.pointFive: Analytics Cookies: Allow us to analyze traffic and user behavior to optimize website functionality and services.
sectionTwo.note: Some cookies are set by third-party services that appear on our pages. You can change your preferences at any time through your browser settings.

cookieTypes.strictlyNecessary: Strictly Necessary Cookies: Essential for website functionality, allowing you to navigate and use features securely. These cannot be disabled.
cookieTypes.performance: Performance Cookies: Help us understand how visitors interact with our site by collecting anonymous data to improve performance.
cookieTypes.functionality: Functionality Cookies: Store user preferences (language, region, display settings) to enhance the browsing experience.
cookieTypes.advertising: Advertising Cookies: Used to deliver relevant advertisements based on your browsing habits and preferences.
cookieTypes.analytics: Analytics Cookies: Allow us to analyze traffic and user behavior to optimize website functionality and services.

sectionThree.title: 3. Managing Cookies
sectionThree.text: You can control and manage cookies through your browser settings. Most browsers allow you to:
sectionThree.pointTwo: Receive notifications before a cookie is stored.
sectionThree.pointThree: Adjust preferences for different types of cookies.
sectionThree.pointFour: View which cookies are active in your browser.
sectionThree.pointFive: Delete specific cookies or all cookies at once.
points: Receive notifications before a cookie is stored.
Adjust preferences for different types of cookies.
sectionThree.note: If you choose to disable cookies, some parts of our website may not function properly.

instructions.chrome: Google Chrome: Manage cookies in Chrome
instructions.firefox: Mozilla Firefox: Manage cookies in Firefox
instructions.edge: Microsoft Edge: Manage cookies in Edge

sectionFour.title: 4. Updates to This Policy
sectionFour.text: We may update this Cookies Policy from time to time to reflect changes in legal requirements or how we use cookies. It is important that you understand:
sectionFour.pointOne: Right to Update: We may modify this policy at any time without prior individual notice.
sectionFour.pointTwo: Publication of Changes: Any updates will be posted on this page with a revised effective date.
sectionFour.pointThree: Notification: Significant changes will be communicated prominently on our website.
sectionFour.pointFour: Continued Acceptance: Your continued use of our website after modifications constitutes acceptance of the revised policy.
sectionFour.pointFive: Periodic Review: We recommend reviewing this policy regularly to stay informed about how we use cookies.
sectionFour.note: If you do not agree with changes to this policy, you can adjust your browser's cookie settings or stop using our website. The 'Last Updated' date at the bottom of this page indicates when the policy was last revised.

sectionFive.title: 5. Contact Us
sectionFive.text: If you have any questions about our use of cookies, we are here to help you. You can contact us through:
sectionFive.pointOne: Email: privacy@molokaih.com for cookies and privacy inquiries.
sectionFive.pointTwo: Response Time: We respond to all inquiries within 48 business hours.
sectionFive.pointThree: User Rights: You can request information about which cookies are active in your session.
sectionFive.pointFour: Deletion Requests: We can guide you on how to delete or manage cookies in your browser.
sectionFive.pointFive: Technical Assistance: Our team can help you with any technical issues related to cookies.
sectionFive.note: Your privacy is important to us. We treat all inquiries with confidentiality and are committed to providing clear and helpful responses about our cookie practices.

paragraphThree.text: Thank you for taking the time to read our Cookies Policy. By continuing to browse our website, you accept the use of cookies as described in this policy.
